name: Doodle Coloring Books
description:
Doodle Coloring Book is an exciting coloring and doodling game for kids and toddlers. It comes packaged with various coloring themes that will spark your children's imagination and engage them to doodle for hours.

To employ your child's creativity, Doodle Coloring Book comes with a perfect set of familiar tools such as colored pencils, brushes, marker pens and even a magic bucket. In addition, creations can be decorated with a collection of beautiful and fun stickers.

We created beautiful HD coloring themes for boys and girls, appropriate for kids of different ages - from toddlers to early teenagers. Doodle Coloring Book is a perfect canvas to bring out the artist hidden in your child.

Intuitive touch screen interface requires no learning – you can begin drawing, doodling, painting or coloring instantly! Thanks to simple design nothing will stay in the way of your child’s creativity. No matter what a child's skill level is – the magic bucket can always save the day.

Allow your child to join the colorful journey into the world of digital canvas.

Features:
• Doodling with tips of your fingers
• Familiar coloring tools (markers, colored pencils, brushes)
• Various coloring themes
• Beautiful HD illustrations
• A set of fun stickers
• Intuitive interface
• Appropriate for children of all ages
